titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Friendship Album (Hesperia, Mi.) 1934-1935
titlestmt.subtitle: Friendship Album (Hesperia, Mi.) Mss. Acc. 2009.345

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Friendship Album (Hesperia, Mi.), 1934-1935 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2009.345
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;
Processed By
Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Friendship album, 1934-1935, of a teenage boy, Jim, from Hesperia Michigan. Contains entries of poems and personal message from friends and family. Entries suggest that Jim is still in school and interested in sports.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Friendship Album (Hesperia, Mi.), Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 08/18/2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and processed in August 2009 by Ute Schechter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Friendship album, 1934-1935, of a teenage boy, Jim, from Hesperia Michigan. Contains entries of poems and personal message from friends and family. Entries suggest that Jim is still in school and interested in sports.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
